content.query:
SELECT
	NULL AS SalesSK,
	sal.SourceSystemOrderID AS OrderID,
	sal.LineNumber AS LineNumber,
	orddat.DateSK AS OrderDateSK,
	shidat.DateSK ShipDateSK,
	NULL AS CustomerSK,
	sal.SourceSystemID AS LocationSK,
	NULL AS MovieSK,
	CASE
		WHEN DATEDIFF(d, sal.OrderDate, sal.ShipDate) < 0 THEN NULL
		ELSE DATEDIFF(d, sal.OrderDate, sal.ShipDate)
	END AS DaysToShip,
	sal.Quantity,
	sal.UnitCost,
	sal.Quantity * sal.UnitCost AS ExtendedCost
FROM
	[ext].[sales] sal
JOIN
	[dbo].[DimDate] orddat
	ON sal.OrderDate = orddat.DateValue
JOIN
	[dbo].[DimDate] shidat
	ON sal.ShipDate = shidat.DateValue

/*

JOIN
	[dbo].[DimDate] rendat
	ON ren.RentalDate = rendat.DateValue
JOIN
	[dbo].[DimDate] retdat
	ON ren.ReturnDate = retdat.DateValue
JOIN
	[ext].[catalog] cat
	ON ren.MovieID = cat.SourceSystemMovieID
JOIN
	[dbo].[DimMovies] mov
	ON cat.Title = mov.MovieTitle
JOIN
	[ext].[customers] cust
	ON ren.CustomerID = cust.SourceSystemCustomerID
JOIN
	[dbo].[DimCustomers] dcus
	ON cust.LastName = dcus.Lastname
	AND cust.FirstName = dcus.FirstName
	AND cust.AddressLine1 = dcus.AddressLine1
	AND cust.ZipCode = dcus.ZipCode



		[SourceSystemID] int,
	[GlobalOrderID] varchar(8000),
	[SourceSystemOrderID] varchar(8000),
	[CustomerID] varchar(8000),
	[OrderDate] date,
	[ShipDate] date,
	[TotalCost] numeric(19,4),
	[OrderCreatedDate] date,
	[OrderUpdatedDate] date,
	[OrderDetailID] varchar(8000),
	[MovieID] varchar(8000),
	[Quantity] int,
	[UnitCost] numeric(19,4),
	[LineNumber] int,
	[OrderDetailCreatedDate] date,
	[OrderDetailUpdatedDate] date

	*/
